name: Super Doggo
description:
Info

What happens when a super powered dog declares war on cats? You get Super Doggo! Super Doggo is platformer about a Super Dog who has decided to bring the war to cats. Using his various powers and classic punching abilites he will destroy cats everywhere. This game has been created for the GDL March Madness Jam here on Itch.io. This game was written from scratch in Java.

Controls

Arrow keys - MOVE

ONE - Sonic Bork

TWO - Power Scratch

Powers

SONIC BORK - Unleash a bork so loud is kills your enemies

POWER SCRATCH - A scratch so annoyingly loud it stuns your enemies.

Credits
  • D-Ron (Darren Shaw) - Programming
  • GiggleBuns (Michael Redmond) - Graphics
  • The music ingame is from : http://ozzed.net/music/8-bit-run-and-pun.shtml
Known Issues
  • To restart the game you have to close & reopen the window. The ingame restart is broken.
  • Some minor collision issues with the platforms.
  • Mac & Linux should run .jar as far as I know
